input:
Good Afternoon,

I am going to be processing your request for case # 220410139 I just wanted to let you know that we do have 2 BWC , 911 audio and also the report available for this incident, the minimum payment is going to be $107.00 ($46 per body warn camera video, $5 for report, $10 for 911 audio). Please advise if you do want these items so I can go ahead and start the process.

Thank you,

Jayda Jaramillo
Records Tech
Pima County Sheriff Department
520-351-8357
Jayda.Jaramillo@sheriff.pima.gov
